pull.title: test: Check error details with assert_debug_log on the assumeutxo invalid hash dump - follow-up #28698
pull.body: This is a follow-up on the invalid hash dump fix #28698, [suggested](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28698#pullrequestreview-1698178157) by theStack and agreed by Sjors and ryanofsky.

events.message:
test, assumeutxo: Use assert_debug_log for error details

This is a follow-up on the invalid hash dump fix PR #28698.

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28698#pullrequestreview-1698178157
